Action.author: jimthematrix
Action.body: ~jeffgarratt it's blocking 6 SDK tasks related to queries in FAB-132, just want to get a feel for when this is likely going to be implemented so I can plan accordingly. thanks

Action.author: jeffgarratt
Action.body: I believe this has changed from being GRPC based to invocation based on chaincode. We can verify.

Action.author: jimthematrix
Action.body: confirmed, all queries are to be made to the QSCC (query system chain code)
